mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.user_grid_id , t1.susp_name , t1.susp_updt , t1.create_by , t1.create_time , t1.modify_by , t1.modify_time , t1.validate_state from ext_wl_jxl_mg_idcardnames t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update ext_wl_jxl_mg_idcardnames t1 set t1.user_grid_id =#{dto.userGridId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.susp_name =#{dto.suspName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.susp_updt =#{dto.suspUpdt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.create_by =#{dto.createBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.create_time =#{dto.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, t1.modify_by =#{dto.modifyBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.modify_time =#{dto.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, t1.validate_state ='1' where t1.id = #{dto.id}
mapper.delete: delete from ext_wl_jxl_mg_idcardnames t1 where t1.ID in (${ids} )
mapper.update: update ext_wl_jxl_mg_idcardnames t1 set t1.validate_state='0' where t1.id in( ${ids})
